_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five things that a weak and sick men: Meditate observing the ugliness of the body
Perceive dissatisfaction with the whole world
Observe the impermanence of all conditions
Have well established the perception of their own death
